mapper.select: /* selectBinListByFarm */ SELECT work_seq workSeq , serial_no serialNo , bin_no binNo , current_weight currentWeight , used_weight usedWeight , add_weight addWeight , reg_dtm regDtm , mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_bin WHERE work_seq = #{workSeq} AND serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY bin_no

/* selectFanListByFarm */ SELECT work_seq workSeq , serial_no serialNo , fan_no fanNo , status status , reg_dtm regDtm , mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_fan WHERE work_seq = #{workSeq} AND serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY fan_no

/* selectLightListByFarm */ SELECT work_seq workSeq , serial_no serialNo , light_no lightNo , lux lux , reg_dtm regDtm , mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_light WHERE work_seq = #{workSeq} AND serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY light_no

/* selectThermoListByFarm */ SELECT work_seq workSeq , serial_no serialNo , thermometer_no thermometerNo , degree degree , reg_dtm regDtm , mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_thermometer WHERE work_seq = #{workSeq} AND serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY thermometer_no

SELECT work_seq , serial_no , water_qntty , reg_dtm FROM tb_farm WHere serial_no = #{serialNo} AND type = 'F' AND water_qntty IS NOT NULL AND reg_dtm >= STR_TO_DATE(#{today}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ORDER BY work_seq

/* selectBinListByBin */
SELECT work_seq , SUM(current_weight) currentWeight , SUM(used_weight) usedWeight , SUM(add_weight) addWeight , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dtm, '%Y%m%d') workDate FROM tb_bin WHERE work_seq IN ( SELECT MAX(work_seq) FROM ( SELECT work_seq , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dtm, '%Y%m%d') work_date FROM tb_farm WHERE serial_no = #{serialNo} AND farm_no = 1 AND type = 'F' ANd reg_dtm >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{fromDate}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND reg_dtm < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{toDate}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) a GROUP BY a.work_date ) GROUP BY work_seq ORDER BY work_seq

/* selectWaterListByWater */
SELECT work_seq , water_qntty waterQntty , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dtm, '%Y%m%d') workDate FROM tb_farm WHERE work_seq IN ( SELECT MAX(work_seq) FROM ( SELECT work_seq , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dtm, '%Y%m%d') work_date FROM tb_farm WHERE serial_no = #{serialNo} AND farm_no = 1 AND type = 'F' ANd reg_dtm >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{fromDate}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND reg_dtm < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{toDate}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) a GROUP BY a.work_date ) ORDER BY work_seq
